ItemTooltips.gauntlets: HP-Boost and builds into Bracer or Urn of Shadows
ItemTooltips.circlet: If there is an allied ganker-type Hero who will get an Urn of Shadows at some point (Pudge, Spirit Breaker, Nightstalker,...) start with a Circlet instead of Gauntlets of Strength which you can turn into a Bracer or Null Talisman / Veil of Discord later.
ItemTooltips.ghost: Get this if you want to pull your ulti off and the enemy team has many rightklickers (especially those with bash-abilities like Faceless Void, Slardar, Sniper....).
ItemTooltips.clarity: This Clarity will improve your early lane presence until you leveled Arcane Aura.
ItemTooltips.flask: Start with one Tango and one Salve.
ItemTooltips.ward_observer: Buy if you are going offlane and repeatedly buy throughout the game.
ItemTooltips.ward_sentry: Use these to gain vision on invisible heroes and enemy wards.
ItemTooltips.tango: Start with one Tango and one Salve.
ItemTooltips.courier: Buy if you are going safe lane or noone else does.
ItemTooltips.tpscroll: Always have one and have an eye on the minimap.TP in to safe allies from ganks or help them get a kill. One Frostbite might be all it takes...
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: Get these if the enemies are constantly overextending or you´re doing great harassing them. Good for chasing or to escape ganks.
ItemTooltips.bracer:
Good HP-Bonus,
eventually builds into Drum of Endurance
ItemTooltips.mekansm:
First item to buy after the core if noone else does.
Adds a lot of survivability. Be sure to use the active in every teamfight.
ItemTooltips.pipe: Buy if you have NOT bought Mekansm AND the enemy team has a lot of magic damage. Some allies might get this item easier than you (Pudge, Centaur) for they normally get a Hood of Defiance anyway.
ItemTooltips.urn_of_shadows:
Great for healing and manareg. ONLY buy if you´re sure you´ll get charges.
Don´t hesitate to use charges offensively to kill off fleeing foes.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: Additional disable, use to shut down one troublesome enemy, stronger disable than Eul´s Scepter. Get Eul´s over this if you are low on funds.
ItemTooltips.cyclone: Additional disable, use to shut down one troublesome enemy, cheaper variant to the Scythe of Vyse. Get Scythe over this if you can afford it.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: Great for positioning and adds a bit of lifereg. Can be swapped for a Blink Dagger if you prefer.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Increases Freezing Fields attack- / movespeedreduction from 30% to 50% and damage by 24%. Compare: Veil of Discord gives 25% for ALL your spells AND your teammates. VERY situational item. Do not get it, if you can´t guarantee you won´t be interupted.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Get this if you want to pull your ulti off and the enemy team has high magic damage or stuns.
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard:
Great in public games with 3-4 carries on the enemy team but very expensive.
Should better be bought by your teams initiator.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: If you need stats and already got a Bracer. The movement bonus helps your team a lot.
ItemTooltips.smoke_of_deceit: Useful item to start ganks across the river and bypass enemy wards.
ItemTooltips.veil_of_discord: Nice defensive stats, active skill lets your ulti hurt a whole lot more. ONLY buy if there are other nukers on your team to benefit from the active.
ItemTooltips.tranquil_boots: Get these if the enemies are playing offensively and do a good job harassing you or if they are playing very defensively and you won´t get any kills.

AbilityTooltips.crystal_maiden_crystal_nova: Crystal Nova is a nice harassment tool even at level 1 and is pretty spammable due to Arcane Aura. Try to always hit multiple enemies and maybe get a lasthit alongside. During teamfights its slow-effect is most important so try to hit heroes who need to position themselves or melee attackers.
AbilityTooltips.crystal_maiden_frostbite:
Frostbite is a very strong disable and therefor extremely useful for ganking and roaming.
In teamfights try to use it on a strong rightklicker since it will not prevent the enemy from casting spells. However it will deal a ministun so try to interupt channeling ultimates like Black Hole.
AbilityTooltips.crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura: Arcane Aura is a HUGE supportskill and will improve the laning experience of your whole team although your teammates will likely not notice this is because of you.
AbilityTooltips.crystal_maiden_freezing_field: Freezing Field is tricky to use but can turn the tide of a teamfight. Level 1 does not do crazy damage  but the slow can be very helpful. To get a proper ulti off you would like to have a teammate with an aoe-stun or a Ghostscepter/BKB which you likely won´t be able to afford.
